# PaddlePaddle Serving Example


## Build

    $ docker build -t serve .

## Run

    $ docker run -v `pwd`:/data -it -p 8000:80 -e WITH_GPU=0 paddlepaddle/book:serve
    $ curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -d
